Text:
function RIR_EP04_13()
    -- .承-3【11月第4週】「友達にしてライバル」
    SaveData.Title = "友達にしてライバル"

    -- //BG：男子部教室（夜）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG015ca")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_BGM("BGM03.wav")

    MSG([[ A week had passed since it was decided that I would face Daria in the Princess Election―― ]])

    MSG([[ That day, as usual, we suddenly had self-study, so the boys’ club was discussing strategies for the Princess Election. ]])

    -- //BU：オウガ（通常）、先輩たち（通常）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_OGA01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_MAA01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

    MSG([[ But in the middle of that, Ouga-kun stared intently at my face and said this. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0317.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Ouga】Normal
 “You don’t look well. Are you pushing yourself again?” ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1050.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】Surprised
 “Huh? How did you know that—ah.” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ There was no denying it anymore. I had no choice but to honestly confess that I was sleep-deprived and feeling unwell. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01da")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1051.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】Sad
 “S-sorry... Lately, I’ve been trying to think up ways to raise Erika’s popularity, so I haven’t been able to fall asleep easily.” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("senpai1_0094.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Mask Senpai #1】Normal
 “You mustn’t overdo it, Minato. Trust us more.” ]])

PLAY_VOICE("senpai2_0067.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Mask Senpai #2】Normal
 “What #1 says is right. Leave it to us today and rest at home, okay?” ]])

PLAY_VOICE("senpai3_0074.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Mask Senpai #3】
 “Heh... Three heads are better than one... Four heads are the Akashic Records. With this lineup, a strategy or two is easy... hehe.” ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_OGA01pa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0318.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Ouga】Laughing loudly
 “Ha-ha-ha! While lamenting your own weakness, quietly go soak in a warm bath at home, enjoy a delicious dinner, and then sleep soundly!” ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01ja")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1052.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】Tearful smile
 “Thanks, everyone.” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

    MSG([[ In fact, my mind was foggy all day, and I couldn’t organize my thoughts well. ]])

    MSG([[ Relying on everyone’s kindness, I decided to go home and rest well today. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)

    -- //BG：男子部校舎（夜）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG021ca")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    -- //BG：校舎前（夜）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG011ca")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask001" , 1000,false)

    MSG([[ On the way out of the boys' building and toward the main street, I suddenly sensed someone on the sports ground. ]])

    -- //BG：グラウンド（夜）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG012ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask001" , 1000,false)

    -- //SE：走る音
PLAY_SE("SEa015.wav")
WAIT(800)

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1053.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】Surprised
 “Huh, what’s that...” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    -- //BU：リラ・体操服（真剣）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR04ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0831.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】Gym clothes・Serious
 “Haa— haa—” ]])

    MSG([[ On the ground, Lira-san was running in her gym clothes. ]])

    MSG([[ At this hour, why...? Curious, I approached, and Lira-san noticed me and stopped. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR04ca")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0832.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】Gym clothes・Surprised
 “M-Minato-kun? What are you doing here? Isn’t it the boys’ club class right now...?” ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01fa")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1054.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】Forced smile・Sweat
 “Actually, I’m not feeling well and was allowed to leave early...” ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01aa")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1055.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】Normal
 “Why are you running at this time? Are you going to participate in the relay race near the prefectural office as usual?” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR04ga")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0833.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】Gym clothes・Flustered
 “Ah, well, something like that! Haha!” ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01ea")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1056.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】Smiling
 “I thought so! I’m sure you’ll place! I’ll definitely come to cheer you on!” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    -- //BU：なし
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

    MSG([[ Not wanting to disturb Lira-san’s practice, I was about to leave, when―― ]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0834.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 “W-wait!” ]])

    -- //BU：リラ・体操服（悲しみ）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR04da")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

    MSG([[ Called out to, I turned back toward Lira-san. ]])

    MSG([[ For some reason, she looked apologetic and spoke in a weak voice. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0835.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】Gym clothes・Sad
 “...Sorry. The relay story was a lie. I’ll tell you the real reason, Minato-kun.” ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1057.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】Surprised
 “The real reason?” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Confused by Lira-san’s unusually weak appearance, I took a step closer. ]])

    MSG([[ Up close, her expression seemed far more girlish than when she acted as Erika. ]])

    MSG([[ I couldn’t help but feel my heart race. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0836.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】Gym clothes・Sad
 “The truth is, I run to build up stamina so I can catch up to Erika even a little.” ]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0837.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】Gym clothes・Sad
 “I don’t know if Minato-kun knows this, but I lost to Erika in a stamina test once.” ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1058.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】Flustered
 “...” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ That was the stamina test from six months ago. I’m the one who hurt Lira-san’s pride—I’d never forget. ]])

    MSG([[ If she’s still bothered by that incident, it pains me deeply. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR04ga")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0838.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】Gym clothes・Flustered
 “Ah! D-don’t get me wrong! I don’t hate Erika at all over that!” ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR04ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0839.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】Gym clothes・Serious
 “I just want to change myself. I want to get strong enough to surpass Daria-senpai, who hurt Erika.” ]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0840.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】Gym clothes・Serious
 “I want to help make your wish to save Marika come true.” ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1059.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】Surprised
 “W-why would you go that far...?” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ In response to my question, Lira-san answered with a smile instantly. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR04ia")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0841.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】Gym clothes・Winking
 “Because I like Erika, obviously.” ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR04ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0842.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】Gym clothes・Smiling
 “I don’t want to be someone who follows Erika; I want to stand alongside her. As the best friend—and the strongest rival.” ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01ha")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1060.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】Blushing
 “Lira-san...” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR04ga")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0843.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】Gym clothes・Flustered
 “Wah!? S-stop, stop! Don’t come any closer!” ]])

    MSG([[ I moved closer without thinking, but Lira-san stopped me. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01ha")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1061.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】Blushing
 “W-why...?” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR04hb")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0844.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】Gym clothes・Blushing
 “I’m all sweaty and my makeup’s a mess! So no! And that last thing you said was super embarrassing!” ]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0845.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】Gym clothes・Blushing
 “Besides, you’re sick, right? You have to go home soon! I’ll keep running a bit longer, but you must go home! That’s final!” ]])

    -- //SE：走る音
PLAY_SE("SEa015.wav")

    -- //BU：なし
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
    LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(50,0,500,Ease.InSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,-200,0,500,Ease.InSine)
    WAIT(500)
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")

    MSG([[ Spouting that, Lira-san started running again. ]])

    MSG([[ Then she disappeared once more into the dark sports ground. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0846.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 “Oh! Tell Erika to rest properly today too—she looks like she’s not feeling well! Your family is seriously working way too hard!” ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01fc")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1062.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】Forced smile
 “I’ll tell her.” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    -- //BG：グラウンド（夜）
    --LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG012ba")
    --SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000)
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG019cc")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask001" , 1000,false)

    MSG([[ I replied to Lira-san’s call from the darkness and left the sports ground. ]])

    MSG([[ The boys’ club, Lira-san, and even I—everyone worries about me more than I do myself. They sincerely want to help me as if it were their own problem. ]])

    MSG([[ Daria is not someone I can handle alone. I decided to properly rely on everyone’s goodwill. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01ea")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1063.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】Smiling
 (Lira-san is strict, but she’s really a kind person.) ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    -- //CI：リラ・体操服（赤面）縦に半分切り抜き 124
    LAYER_LOAD(200,"BG000aa")
    LAYER_LOAD(201,"BUL_RIR04hb")
    LAYER_POSITION(201, -110, 80)
    SET_CUTIN_31_XL(-35, 500)

    -- //SE：心臓の音
PLAY_SE("SEa025.wav")
WAIT(400)

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1064.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】Flustered
 “Eh—” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ The image of Lira-san blushing flickered in my mind, and my heart suddenly beat faster. ]])

    MSG([[ C-could this really be...? ]])

    RESET_CUTIN_31_XL(500)

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01ha")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1065.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】Blushing
 “N-no... The one I like is Riko-san... This is different...” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ I repeated the words to myself over and over, trying to convince myself. Still, my heartbeat wouldn’t stop. ]])

    MSG([[ Inside my chest, I felt an unfamiliar kind of guilt spreading through me. ]])

    -- 　　　　◆
STOP_BGM(1000)
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000", 1000,false)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    ScenarioManager.Next("RIR_EP04_14")
end
